nodes.text: Port Raga was a backwater trading and refueling station catering to all business, legal or otherwise. When a former member of Havoc Squad, Zora, kidnapped Republic Senator Zorin Krasul, she took him to Port Raga and locked him in a hangar. However, Havoc Squad's new lieutenant arrived with Ava Jaxo and rescued the senator before Zora could detonate the explosives she strapped him to.
